html:
June 25 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Berkeley Group, Nokia Oyj and WPP, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Citigroup raises to buy from neutral

* Europcar Mobility Group EUCAR.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises to buy from hold

* Logitech International SA LOGN.S: Goldman Sachs cuts to neutral from buy

* Nokia Oyj NOKIA.HE: Goldman Sachs raises to buy from neutral

* WPP WPP.L: Credit Suisse raises to neutral from underperform


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Aveva AVV.L: HSBC raises to buy from hold; raises target price to 4345p from 3870p

* BBVA BBVA.MC: RBC raises price target to EUR 6.10 from EUR 5.30

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Citigroup raises price target to 5103p from 4601p

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Citigroup raises to buy from neutral

* Berkeley Group BKGH.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 4,950p from 4,810p

* BMW BMWG.DE: Barclays raises target price to EUR 108 from EUR 95

* Brenntag SE BNRGn.DE: HSBC raises target price to EUR 91 from EUR 90

* Bunzl BNZL.L: HSBC raises target price to 3250p from 3000p

* CA Immobilien Anlagen AG CAIV.VI: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to EUR 42 from EUR 46

* Campari CPRI.MI: Exane BNP Paribas starts with outperform rating; PT EUR 13.2

* Capgemini CAPP.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 180 from EUR 175

* Cargotec Corp CGCBV.HE: Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 48 from EUR 46

* Crest Nicholson Holdings Plc CRST.L: Barclays raises target price to 420p from 375p

* Crest Nicholson Holdings Plc CRST.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 370p from 320p

* CRH Plc CRH.I: Berenberg raises to buy from hold; raises PT to EUR 51 from EUR 40

* Diploma Plc DPLM.L: HSBC raises target price to 3160p from 2705p

* DS Smith SMDS.L: Berenberg raises target price to 500p from 475p

* DSV DSV.CO: Citigroup raises price target to DKK 1710 from DKK 1600

* DSV DSV.CO: UBS raises target price to DKK 1470 from DKK 1425

* Electrocomponents Plc ECM.L: HSBC raises target price to 1200p from 1150p

* Essilorluxottica SA ESLX.PA: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 170 from EUR 145

* Europcar Mobility Group EUCAR.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises PT to EUR 0.60 from EUR 0.45

* Europcar Mobility Group EUCAR.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises to buy from hold

* Faurecia EPED.PA: Citigroup cuts price target to EUR 47 from EUR 51

* Hannover Rueck SE HNRGn.DE: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 190 from EUR 175

* Traton SE 8TRA.DE: Barclays raises target price to EUR 34 from EUR 33
